definition: compiled and published by Imperial command (old)
surname Qin
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: I have never read the King James version of the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 我从未读过詹姆士国王钦定白勺圣经英译本。

sentences.english: Chapter four. The King James Bible or let there be light reading.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，钦定版《圣经》或曰要有消遣读物。

definition: to confer a title upon sb/to dub/to crown/to invest with rank or title
to select sb for a position without announcing the decision until later/to decide behind closed doors/all cut and dried
to set one's heart on/to set one's choice on
to succeed sb in a job/successor
to give orders
worship/to revere/to venerate
to confer a title on (an empress or a prince)
successor
heir apparent to a throne
crown prince
to seal up (a door with a paper seal, or a document)/to confer an additional title on a nobleman
to appoint sb to a post or confer a title on sb by imperial order
choice of person/candidate
to ascend the throne
to recommend
to depose (a king)
